law_name: THE REMOVAL OF ACCUSED PERSONS ACT

sections.body: (1) This Act may be called the Removal of Accused Persons Act, 1973. (2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan. (3) it shall come into force at once.

Notwithstanding anything contained in any other law for the time being in force, the Federal Government may, by general or special order, provide for the removal of any accused person or class of accused persons held in custody in any Province to any other Province to be held in custody therein.
1 [ Omitted] RGN  1Omitted by the Federal Laws (Revision and Declaration) Ordinance No. XXVII of 1981, s.3 and sch. II.
